Motion

Alright, great job with the live preparations!
Give it your all for the main event too! ──Let's dig in!

Let's dig in! / Let's dig in! / Let's dig in! /
Let's dig in... / Let's dig in!

Oh, sorry, Natsuha-chan!
Could you pass the soy sauce?
Huh? Oh, sure...

Huh?
Choco-senpai, why do you put soy sauce on it?
What do you mean? On Korokke, of course...

No way!?
Isn't it usually sauce for Korokke?

What!? We all use soy sauce──...
──We're a soy sauce-loving group!

Oh, uh...!
Then who prefers sauce?
Yes! / Yes / Yes... / Yes!
I-I see...!?

──Chiyoko, it's natural to be surprised like that.
I had a similar experience earlier...
I had stew as my main, but there was no bread...!
So, Hiori-chan, do you have bread with your stew?

Yes, that's why I'm so moved right now.
It's a wonderful encounter between stew and rice!
Hiori always absorbs new experiences with such purity.

Yes...!
She's truly an adult genius...! Amazing...!

──So, Choco,
wanna try Korokke with sauce today?

Huh!? That's unexpected, isn't it!? But──... Alright!
As the Choco Idol, I'll take on the challenge of sauce today!
──Thanks for the meal!
